definition: To make a decision or reach a conclusion after careful consideration or deliberation. It is commonly used to refer to the act of formally deciding or resolving something, often in a group or official setting.

examples.german: Ich habe beschlossen, nach Deutschland zu reisen.
examples.english: I have decided to travel to Germany.

examples.german: Wir haben beschlossen, das Projekt abzubrechen.
examples.english: We have decided to cancel the project.
They decide to wake up early tomorrow.

examples.german: Der Vorstand hat beschlossen, die Gehälter zu erhöhen.
examples.english: The board has decided to increase the salaries.

examples.german: Ich habe beschlossen, mit dem Rauchen aufzuhören.
examples.english: I have decided to quit smoking.
